instruction: Pulmicort Flexhaler 400 micrograms, two inhalations in the morning and two at bedtime, approximately twelve hours apart, until the smoke clears.

attributes.sig: Inhale 2 puffs twice daily by mouth using the Pulmicort Flexhaler to manage respiratory symptoms due to smoke exposure.
attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense one Pulmicort Flexhaler 90 mcg/actuation for a 7-day supply.

instruction: Rinse, gargle, and spit after each set of puffs to prevent hoarseness and mouth thrush. If metallic taste or voice cracks occur, contact the clinic.

attributes.comment: Rinse, gargle, and spit after each set of puffs to prevent hoarseness and mouth thrush.

instruction: Dispose of half-empty 200 microgram cartridges to avoid confusion. Keep new 400 microgram cartridges in a dry pouch to prevent heat damage.

attributes.comment: Dispose of half-empty 200 microgram cartridges to avoid confusion.

instruction: Fax the pharmacy for two fresh 400-microgram cartridges, including one spare for the trip.

attributes.comment: Include one spare cartridge for the trip.
attributes.title: Fax pharmacy for two 400-microgram cartridges

instruction: If unable to rinse after inhalation on the bus, swish when reaching the school's restroom.

attributes.comment: If unable to rinse after inhalation on the bus, swish when reaching the school's restroom.

instruction: If travel disrupts dosing schedule, take one puff at noon and the second at bedtime. Call if rescue inhaler is used four times.

attributes.narrative: If travel disrupts dosing schedule, take one puff at noon and the second at bedtime. Call if rescue inhaler is used four times.
